mapper.select:
SELECT A.NM , A.ATC_NM AS ATC_NM , A.YYYY||'년' AS CURRENT_YEAR -- 년
, CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '01', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '01', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '01' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '01' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '01', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '01', 1)),0) END AS ACOL1 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '02', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '02', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '02' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '02' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '02', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '02', 1)),0) END AS ACOL2 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '03', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '03', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '03' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '03' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '03', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '03', 1)),0) END AS ACOL3 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '04', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '04', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '04' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '04' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '04', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '04', 1)),0) END AS ACOL4 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '05', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '05', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '05' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '05' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '05', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '05', 1)),0) END AS ACOL5 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '06', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '06', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '06' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '06' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '06', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '06', 1)),0) END AS ACOL6 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '07', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '07', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '07' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '07' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '07', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '07', 1)),0) END AS ACOL7 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '08', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '08', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '08' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '08' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '08', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '08', 1)),0) END AS ACOL8 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '09', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '09', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '09' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '09' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '09', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '09', 1)),0) END AS ACOL9 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '10', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '10', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '10' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '10' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '10', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '10', 1)),0) END AS ACOL10 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '11', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '11', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '11' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '11' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '11', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '11', 1)),0) END AS ACOL11 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '12', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '12', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '12' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '12' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '12', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '12', 1)),0) END AS ACOL12 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN COUNT(1) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN COUNT(1) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN SUM(PR) ELSE COUNT(*) END AS TCNT , 0 AS MAXVAL , 0 AS MINVAL , 0 AS AVG
FROM ( SELECT '1' AS NM -- A/S건 , 'A/S건' AS ATC_NM , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,1,4) AS YYYY , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,5,2) AS MM , 0 AS PR , PD_CD AS VS161_GDS_CD , VS161.PD_GRP_CD FROM TB_SVPD_QLTY_MNGT_AS_DTL_IZ VS161 WHERE 1=1 AND WK_PROCS_YM LIKE #{baseY}||'%' AND (SELECT CDTL.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ GIGI INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL CDTL ON CDTL.CNTR_NO = GIGI.CNTR_NO AND CDTL.CNTR_SN = GIGI.CNTR_SN WHERE GIGI.CNTR_NO = SUBSTR(FN_SVPD_WELSF_CD_01(VS161.CNTR_NO, VS161.CNTR_SN), 1, 12) AND GIGI.CNTR_SN = SUBSTR(FN_SVPD_WELSF_CD_01(VS161.CNTR_NO, VS161.CNTR_SN), 13, 1) ) NOT IN ('401','402') AND PD_GRP_CD = '11'
AND SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{svType}
AND BAD_DV_CD = #{badDivide}
AND PD_CD = 'WM05106251'
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106338', 'WM05106341')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106339','WM05106342')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106340','WM05106343')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106344')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106355','WM05106356','WM05106363','WM05106364','WM05106365','WM05106346','WM05106345')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106357','WM05106358','WM05106366','WM05106367','WM05106347','WM05106348')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106359','WM05106360','WM05106368','WM05106369','WM05106349','WM05106350')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106351','WM05106352','WM05106361','WM05106362','WM05106370','WM05106371')
AND SDING_CAUS_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdingPkgCd}||'%'
UNION ALL
SELECT '2' AS NM --렌탈 계정(수) , '렌탈 계정(수)' AS ATC_NM , SUBSTR(AC202.MNGT_YM,1,4) AS YYYY , SUBSTR(AC202.MNGT_YM,5,2) AS MM , 0 AS PR , PDCT_PD_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ AC202 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PBAS ON PBAS.PD_CD = AC202.PDCT_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 /*상품각사속성상세*/ /* TB_PDBS_PD_PRP_META_BAS 테이블에서 각 속성의 의미 파악, TBL_ID = 'TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL' AND PD_PRP_GRP_DTL_DV_CD = 'PART'*/ ON PBAS.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' /*상품확장속성그룹코드*/ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ WHERE 1=1 AND AC202.MNGT_YM LIKE #{baseY}||'%' AND (SELECT CDTL.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ GIGI INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL CDTL ON CDTL.CNTR_NO = GIGI.CNTR_NO AND CDTL.CNTR_SN = GIGI.CNTR_SN WHERE GIGI.MNGT_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND GIGI.CNTR_NO = SUBSTR(FN_SVPD_WELSF_CD_01(AC202.CNTR_NO, AC202.CNTR_SN), 1, 12) AND GIGI.CNTR_SN = SUBSTR(FN_SVPD_WELSF_CD_01(AC202.CNTR_NO, AC202.CNTR_SN), 13, 1) ) NOT IN ('401','402') AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '11'
AND PBAS.PD_CD = 'WM05106251'
AND PBAS.PD_CD IN ('WM05106338', 'WM05106341')
AND PBAS.PD_CD IN ('WM05106339','WM05106342')
AND PBAS.PD_CD IN ('WM05106340','WM05106343')
AND PBAS.PD_CD IN ('WM05106344')
AND PBAS.PD_CD IN ('WM05106355','WM05106356','WM05106363','WM05106364','WM05106365','WM05106346','WM05106345')
AND PBAS.PD_CD IN ('WM05106357','WM05106358','WM05106366','WM05106367','WM05106347','WM05106348')
AND PBAS.PD_CD IN ('WM05106359','WM05106360','WM05106368','WM05106369','WM05106349','WM05106350')
AND PBAS.PD_CD IN ('WM05106351','WM05106352','WM05106361','WM05106362','WM05106370','WM05106371')
AND AC202.BASE_PD_CD IN ( SELECT BASE_PD_CD FROM T_CMZ_CD_D , TB_PDBS_PD_REL WHERE CD_ID = 'AS_CAUS_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = #{sdingPkgCd} AND USER_DFN_03 = OJ_PD_CD AND PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' AND AC202.IST_DT BETWEEN LCSDAY AND LCEDAY )
UNION ALL
SELECT '3' AS NM --A/S율(%) , 'A/S율(%)' AS ATC_NM , #{baseY} AS YYYY , '' AS MM , 0 AS PR , '' AS GDS_CD , '' AS PD_GRP_CD FROM DUAL
UNION ALL
SELECT '4' AS NM -- 엔지니어비용 , '엔지니어비용' AS ATC_NM , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,1,4) AS YYYY , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,5,2) AS MM , 0 AS PR , VS161.PD_CD , VS161.PD_GRP_CD FROM TB_SVPD_QLTY_MNGT_AS_DTL_IZ VS161 WHERE WK_PROCS_YM LIKE #{baseY}||'%' AND PD_GRP_CD = '11'
AND SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{svType}
AND BAD_DV_CD = #{badDivide}
AND PD_CD = 'WM05106251'
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106338', 'WM05106341')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106339','WM05106342')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106340','WM05106343')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106344')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106355','WM05106356','WM05106363','WM05106364','WM05106365','WM05106346','WM05106345')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106357','WM05106358','WM05106366','WM05106367','WM05106347','WM05106348')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106359','WM05106360','WM05106368','WM05106369','WM05106349','WM05106350')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106351','WM05106352','WM05106361','WM05106362','WM05106370','WM05106371')
AND SDING_CAUS_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdingCausNm}||'%'
UNION ALL
SELECT '5' AS NM -- 부품비용 , '부품비용' AS ATC_NM , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,1,4) AS YYYY , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,5,2) AS MM , NVL((SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '1' OR SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '2' OR SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '3' THEN PDCT_UPRC ELSE 0 END) FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ ST163 , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PBAS WHERE PBAS.PD_CD = ST163.ITM_PD_CD AND VS161.CNTR_NO = ST163.CNTR_NO AND VS161.CNTR_SN = ST163.CNTR_SN AND VS161.CST_SV_ASN_NO = ST163.CST_SV_ASN_NO) , 0) AS PR , VS161.PD_CD , VS161.PD_GRP_CD FROM TB_SVPD_QLTY_MNGT_AS_DTL_IZ VS161 WHERE WK_PROCS_YM LIKE #{baseY}||'%' AND PD_GRP_CD = '11'
AND SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{svType}
AND BAD_DV_CD = #{badDivide}
AND PD_CD = 'WM05106251'
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106338', 'WM05106341')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106339','WM05106342')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106340','WM05106343')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106344')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106355','WM05106356','WM05106363','WM05106364','WM05106365','WM05106346','WM05106345')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106357','WM05106358','WM05106366','WM05106367','WM05106347','WM05106348')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106359','WM05106360','WM05106368','WM05106369','WM05106349','WM05106350')
AND PD_CD IN ('WM05106351','WM05106352','WM05106361','WM05106362','WM05106370','WM05106371')
AND SDING_CAUS_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdingPkgCd}||'%'
)A GROUP BY A.NM, A.ATC_NM , A.YYYY||'년' ORDER BY NM
